thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: PHIL

author: PHIL
title: PHIL
text: I am a former car mechanic, now retired. I love cars and motorcycles. Unfortunately, my arthritis now pretty much prevents me from working on my vehicles anymore. But what's almost worse, is when I have to have my vehicle repaired or serviced and get it back to find that it hasn't been done properly, or there are greasy fingerprints on the bonnet or doors or steering wheel or all of the above. I realise that as a former mechanic from a different era, I am probably a rather exacting customer, and I almost dread anyone working on my car because of my previous experiences. But I have to say my recent experience for the first time with Lubemobile was excellent. I will certainly be using them in future and can't recommend them highly enough.
